title: Day 163 (1 Kings 7, 2 Chronicles 4) - Year 4

description:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Exodus 31:3

- Video: Model of Solomon's Temple

- Video: A'in Dara Temple in Syria (before/after air strikes)

- Philippians 1:6
